products.title: Green Lion G-KID 20 Kids Tablet Android 11.0 8inch 2GB+64GB
products.description: It is introducing the Green Lion G-Kid 20 Kids Tablet, which combines engagement and durability for young learners into one piece. The number of features on this tablet will increase your child’s learning process and make it entertaining. Powered with an SC7731E Quad-Core high-performance processor coupled with 2GB RAM, the G-Kid 20 ensures silky-smooth navigation and seamless multitasking. This tablet offers an 8-inch IPS display with 1280×800 resolution, providing visually great performance for kids. The Android 11.0 operating system opens wide avenues to educational apps and games.
